metadata.name: The Sound Of The Mirror
metadata.description:
This animation is based on the painting The Sound of Mirror, which is an oil painting on canvas and deals with the conditions of Eastern women who are surrounded by Iranian Islamic symbols.
A picture of a woman from the Qajar era who is sitting in front of a mirror but cannot see herself because of the cloth on her face. This self-estrangement is a description of the culture's encroachment on women.
